patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,110 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>

+     limitations under the License.

+
+<resources>
+
+    <!-- Caffeine tile -->
+    <string name="quick_settings_caffeine_label">Cafeína</string>
+    <string name="accessibility_quick_settings_caffeine_off">Caféina desligado</string>
+    <string name="accessibility_quick_settings_caffeine_on">Caféina ligado</string>
+
+    <!-- Power Menu -->
+    <string name="global_action_reboot">Reiniciar</string>
+    <string name="global_action_reboot_more">Reiniciar\u2026</string>
+    <string name="global_action_reboot_sub">Sistema</string>
+    <string name="global_action_reboot_recovery">Recuperação</string>
+    <string name="global_action_reboot_bootloader">Bootloader</string>
+    <string name="global_action_settings">Configurações</string>
+
+    <!-- DataSwitch Tile -->
+    <string name="qs_data_switch_label">Mudar cartão de dados para</string>
+    <string name="qs_data_switch_toast_0">Atualmente, nenhum cartão SIM está inserido</string>
+    <string name="qs_data_switch_toast_1">Atualmente, apenas um cartão SIM está inserido</string>
+    <string name="qs_data_switch_changed_1">Mudar cartão de dados para SIM 1</string>
+    <string name="qs_data_switch_changed_2">Mudar cartão de dados para SIM 2</string>
+
+    <!-- Reading mode tile -->
+    <string name="quick_settings_reading_mode">Modo de leitura</string>
+
+    <!-- Name of the volte/vowifi status bar icon. -->
+    <string name="status_bar_ims">VoLTE/VoWiFi</string>
+
+    <!-- Title of statusbar tuner -->
+    <string name="status_bar_icons">Ícones da barra de status</string>
+
+    <!-- Scrolling Screenshot string -->
+    <string name="scrollss">Rolagem</string>
+
+    <!-- Data usage info -->
+    <string name="usage_data">Usado</string>
+
+    <!-- Screenrecorder -->
+    <string name="screenrecord_stopdot_label">Mostrar ponto de parada\npressione longamente para movelo</string>
+    <string name="screenrecord_lowquality_label">Qualidade inferior para arquivos de tamanho menor</string>
+
+    <!-- QS header info separator -->
+    <string name="qs_header_info_separator" translatable="false">\u0020\u0020•\u0020\u0020</string>
+
+    <!-- Name of the camera status bar icon. -->
+    <string name="status_bar_camera">Câmera</string>
+    <!-- Name of the location status bar icon. -->
+    <string name="status_bar_location">Localização</string>
+    <!-- Name of the microphone status bar icon. -->
+    <string name="status_bar_microphone">Microfone</string>
+
+    <!-- Heads Up QS Tile -->
+    <string name="quick_settings_heads_up_label">Notificações flutuantes</string>
+    <string name="accessibility_quick_settings_heads_up_off">Notificações flutuantes desabilitado</string>
+    <string name="accessibility_quick_settings_heads_up_on">Notificações flutuantes Habilitado</string>
+    <string name="accessibility_quick_settings_heads_up_changed_off">Desligar notificações flutuantes</string>
+    <string name="accessibility_quick_settings_heads_up_changed_on">Ligar notificações flutuantes</string>
+
+    <!-- USB tethering QS tile -->
+    <string name="quick_settings_usb_tether_label">Tethering USB</string>
+
+    <!-- Screenshot QS tile -->
+    <string name="quick_settings_screenshot_label">Captura de tela</string>
+    <string name="quick_settings_region_screenshot_label">Captura parcial da tela</string>
+
+    <!-- Sound QS Tile -->
+    <string name="quick_settings_sound_label">Sons</string>
+    <string name="quick_settings_sound_ring">Toque</string>
+    <string name="quick_settings_sound_vibrate">Vibração</string>
+    <string name="quick_settings_sound_mute">Mudo</string>
+
+    <!-- Reboot/Recovery QS tile -->
+    <string name="quick_settings_reboot_label">Reiniciar</string>
+    <string name="quick_settings_reboot_recovery_label">Recuperação</string>
+
+    <!-- Headphones Buddy -->
+    <string name="hp_buddy">Fone de ouvido</string>
+    <string name="hp_buddy_left">Esquerdo apenas</string>
+    <string name="hp_buddy_right">Direito apenas</string>
+    <string name="hp_buddy_center">Ambos</string>
+    <string name="hp_buddy_not_connected">Conecte seus fones de ouvido</string>
+
+    <!-- Name of the VPN status bar icon. -->
+    <string name="status_bar_vpn">VPN</string>
+
+    <!-- Partial screenshot -->
+    <string name="global_screenshot_selector_capture_description">Captura parcial de tela</string>
+    <string name="global_screenshot_selector_cancel_description">Cancelar captura parcial de tela</string>
+
+    <!-- Screenshot Delete Toast -->
+    <string name="delete_screenshot_toast">Captura de tela excluída</string>
+
+</resources>
